value.title: Anomaly detection using machine learning in Azure Stream Analytics | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Stream Analytics is a fully managed serverless offering on Azure. With the new Anomaly Detection functions in Stream Analytics, the whole complexity associated with building and training custom machine learning (ML) models is reduced to a simple function call resulting in lower costs, faster time
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ra8HhBLdzHE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Friday | Apache Kafka on HDInsight
value.excerpt: Raghav Mohan joins Scott Hanselman to talk about Apache Kafka on HDInsight, which added the open-source distributed streaming platform last year to complete a scalable, big data streaming scenario on Azure. The service has come a long way since - processing millions of events/sec, petabytes of data/day
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gttwnNDHuZ4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Azure Purview: New connectors, Synapse integration, enhanced business glossary, etc. | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to show him what's new in Azure Purview since it was released in public preview in December 2020. Azure Purview is a unified data governance service that helps you manage and govern your on-premises, multicloud, and software-as-a-service (SaaS) data. Easily create
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cLl7g7RP8Bo" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Implement a Data Warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Azure Synapse Analytics provides a relational big data store that can scale to Petabytes of data. In this learning path, you will learn how Azure Synapse Analytics can achieve this scale with itsâ€™ Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) architecture. Create a data warehouse in minutes and use familiar querying language to build reports. Load massive amounts of data in minutes, and ensure that your data warehouse is secure.

topItems.title: Design a data warehouse with Azure Synapse Analytics
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create a data warehouse in Azure Synapse Analytics in minutes to take advantage of massively parallel processing (MPP) and run complex queries at petabyte scale quickly

value.title: Azure HDInsight: New Spark UI extensions for better job performance analysis | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Maxim Lukiyanov and Scott Hanselman discuss intricate ways in which Apache Spark jobs can fail in production and how new diagnostics tools, now available in Azure HDInsight, visualize these problems in a new intuitive way and help discover and understand them from the first glance. [04:13] Demo Start

value.title: Bring your own keys on Apache Kafka with Azure HDInsight | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Dhruv Goel and Scott Hanselman discuss why enterprise customers trust Apache Kafka on Azure HDInsight with their streaming ingestion needs. Get even more control over the security of your data at rest with Bring-Your-Own-Key encryption for Kafka. With Azure HDInsight, you get the best of open source

value.title: Fine-grained security with Apache Ranger on HDInsight Kafka | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Dhruv Goel and Scott Hanselman discuss why enterprise customers trust Apache Kafka on Azure HDInsight with their streaming ingestion needs. Integrate Kafka with Azure Active Directory for authentication and set up fine-grained access control with Apache Ranger to let multiple users access Kafka easily

value.title: HDInsight: Fast Interactive Queries with Hive on LLAP | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Murali Krishnaprasad joins Lara Rubbelke to discuss Interactive Query (also called Hive LLAP, or Low Latency Analytical Processing, or Live Long and Process), which is an Azure HDInsight cluster type. Interactive Query supports in-memory caching, which makes Hive queries super-fast and interactive. See
